content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently has no ingredients to smelt, producing iron plates.
  
### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently has no ingredients to smelt, producing copper plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace inventory management
- Monitor the furnace inventory to ensure there are sufficient ingredients to smelt. If the furnace has no ingredients, it will not produce any output.
